text: Mohamed Hamed Hassan Khan ( ; 26 October 1942 â€“ 26 July 2016) was an Egyptian-British actor, director and screenwriter. He was a well-known member of the "1980s generation" in Egyptian cinema, along with directors such as Khairy Beshara, Daoud Abdel Sayed, Atef El-Tayeb, and Yousry Nasrallah. His 1983 movie The Street Player was entered into the 13th Moscow International Film Festival. He was known for directing Ayyam El Sadat, Mr Karate and Before the Summer Crowds. Khan died on 26 July 2016 at the age of 73.Mohamed Khan, Leading Egyptian Filmmaker, Dies at 74 == References == == Other websites == * Category:1942 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Cairo Category:British movie directors Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom
title: Mohamed Khan
